class.situation: Your Medical Device belongs to Class I under MHRA rules
actionNeeded: check that your products meet the relevant essential requirements of Annex I of the MDD
carry out a clinical evaluation as described in Annex X of the MDD
notify MHRA of any proposals to carry out a clinical investigation to demonstrate safety and performance
prepare technical documentation
if your medical device is sterile or has a measuring function, get notified body approval
draw up the ‘EC declaration of conformity’
put the CE marking on your devices as described in Article 17 of the MDD
register with MHRA
implement and maintain corrective action and vigilance procedures including a systematic procedure to review experience gained in the post-production phase
provide relevant documentation if MHRA requests it

provideURL.situation: you can not provide the URL
actionNeeded: Be able to provide your URL.

contactOrganisation.situation: Not able to contact you or your organisation directly via the product.
actionNeeded: Provide some methods that can be used to contact you or your prganisation.

NHSDBranding.situation: You are using NHSD branding without permission.
actionNeeded: Request the permission from NHSD.

confirmGPC.situation: You are not able to provide evidence showing you have registered with GPC.
actionNeeded: Collect evidence and be able to provide.

confirmHealthcareReg.situation: You can not confirm their status and names of the service that requires registered healthcare professionals to operate.
actionNeeded: Be able to confirm their status and names.

guestLogin.situation: You are not able to provide a guest login.
actionNeeded: Provide the users with a Guest Login to protect their privacy.

confirmRegWithCQC.situation: You can not confirm the registration with CQC when required.
actionNeeded: Please register with CQC.

provideCQCnumber.situation: You are not able to provide the CQC number when required.
actionNeeded: Contact with CQC to have your CQC number.

provdieReCQC.situation: You are not able to provide your recent CQC registration certificate when required.
actionNeeded: Collect your certificates in e-format.

provideDescrip.situation: You are not able to provide the description of your product.
actionNeeded: Be able to provide the description of your product in e-format.

confirmReplNHSservice.situation: You are not able to provide details of how your product replaces a NHSD service when you confirmed that it could replace a NHSD service.
actionNeeded: Communicate with developers and provide the deatails of how your product could replace a NHSD service.

provideTrial.situation: You are not able to provide the details of the pilot or trial of your product.
actionNeeded: Discuss with developers about the trial or pilot and have a in-depth plan of the trial or pilot.

confirmWhereProcessPD.situation: You do not know where the product processes the personal data of NHSD an NHSD related organisation.
actionNeeded: Discuss with other developers to confirm where your product processes the personal data.

versionNumber.situation: You are not able to provide the version number that running on iOS/Android/Windows Mobile/ OS X/ Linux/others.
actionNeeded: Confirm with version number on devices.

typeOfPharmacy.situation: You do not have a clear type of pharmacy in the registratino or loggin page.
actionNeeded: Hvae a clear sign about type of pharmacy in registration or loggin page.

evidenceOfClicBenefit.situation: You are not able to provide the evidence of the clinical benefits after you confirmed that your product can provide clinical benefits.
actionNeeded: Be able to provide evidence in writing documents of testing or experiments.

URLofBenefits.situation: You are not able to provide the URL or relevant document after you confrimed that your product has clinical benefits.
actionNeeded: Be able to provide the URL.

reasonNotClinicBenefit.situation: You are not able to provide the reason why your product does not have clinical benefits.
actionNeeded: Prepare to provide the reason why your product does not have clinical evidence.

reasonNotBehaBenefits.situation: You are not able to provide the reason why your product does not have behavioural benefits.
actionNeeded: Prepare for the reason why your product does not have behavioural benefits.

class.situation: Your DHT belongs to Tier 1 under NICE rules
actionNeeded: Publish publicly available evidence documenting the role of relevant UK health or social care experts in the design, development, testing or sign-off of the DHT.
Evidence to show successful implementation of the DHT in the UK health and social care system.

Publish publically available evidence to show that representatives from intended user groups were involved in the design, development or testing of the DHT and to show that users are satisfied with the DHT.
Show evidence of the DHT being used in hard-to-reach populations.
Data or analysis which shows that the data generated or recorded by the DHT is: accurate, reproducible, relevant to the range of values expected in the target population.

Technical data showing that numerical, text, audio, image-based, graphic-based or video information is: not changed during the transmission process, and not biased by the data ‘value’ expected from the target patient population.
